measurements onesize gauge 24 sts x 33 row = 10 x 10 cm in lace pattern on 3 5 mm needles after blocking recommended needles 3 5 mm circular needles 60cm long yarn 25 g of classic by cardiff cashmere or any other yarn that meets the gauge the scarf in the pictures is knitted in classic by cardiff cashmere in col 721 ito techniques m1r m1l k2tog sl1 k1 psso abbreviations st s = stitch es m1r = make one right k = knit m1l = make one left p = purl k2tog = knit two stitches together rs = right side sl1 k1 psso = slip one knit one pass slipped stitch over ws = wrong side yo = yarn over wyif = with yarn in front co = cast on about the rosemary scarf is a delicate accessory worked in a light and airy lace pattern framed by elegant i-cord edges for a graceful finish knitted flat and guided by a chart it s an approachable project which lets you settle into a calm steady flow the length can be adjusted to suit your personal style making it a timeless piece for any wardrobe charts for the swatch and the scarf can be found at the end of the pattern 1 a l l u r e k n i t s rosemary scarf pattern co 7 sts and then follow the chart the first row is worked on the ws work row 1-26 then continue by working row 27 42 until the scarf measures your desired length my scarf measured about 73 cm right before i started decreasing please note that any changes in length will alter the yarn usage to finish work row 43-79 and then bind-off the remaining 7 sts knitwise finishing weave in all of the ends wet block your scarf and dry flat 2 a l l u r e k n i t s rosemary scarf chart for the swatch 3 a l l u r e k n i t s rosemary scarf chart for scarf 4 a l l u r e k n i t s rosemary scarf 5 a l l u r e k n i t s rosemary scarf about allureknits i m tanja the hands and heart behind allureknits my vision is to offer women a wardrobe filled with timeless feminine essentials pieces that bring joy for years through their quality and durability in a world that moves too fast i invite you to slow down and create clothing with your own hands instead of simply consuming a knitted piece is more than just clothing it elevates your presence adds lightness and lets you feel effortlessly
